verses.verse: And 'Elohim <WH430> remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> Noach <WH5146>, and every living thing <WH2416>, and all the cattle <WH929> that was with him in the ark <WH8392>: and 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH5674> a wind <WH7307> to pass <WH5674> <WH8686> over <WH5921> the earth <WH776>, and the waters <WH4325> asswaged <WH7918> <WH8799>;

The fountains <WH4599> also of the deep <WH8415> and the windows <WH699> of heaven <WH8064> were stopped <WH5534> <WH8735>, and the rain <WH1653> from heaven <WH8064> was restrained <WH3607> <WH8735>;

And the waters <WH4325> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> from off the earth <WH776> continually <WH1980> <WH8800> <WH7725> <WH8800>: and after the end <WH7097> of the hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> days <WH3117> the waters <WH4325> were abated <WH2637> <WH8799>.

And the ark <WH8392> rested <WH5117> <WH8799> in the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>, on the seventeenth <WH6240> <WH7651> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, upon the mountains <WH2022> of Ararat <WH780>.

And the waters <WH4325> decreased <WH2637> <WH8800> continually <WH1980> <WH8800> until <WH5704> the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2320>: in the tenth <WH6224> month, on the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, were the tops <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022> seen <WH7200> <WH8738>.
And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117>, that Noach <WH5146> opened <WH6605> <WH8799> the window <WH2474> of the ark <WH8392> which he had made <WH6213> <WH8804>:

And he sent forth <WH7971> <WH8762> a raven <WH6158>, which went forth <WH3318> <WH8799> to <WH3318> <WH8800> and fro <WH7725> <WH8800>, until the waters <WH4325> were dried up <WH3001> <WH8800> from off the earth <WH776>.
Also he sent forth <WH7971> <WH8762> a dove <WH3123> from him, to see <WH7200> <WH8800> if the waters <WH4325> were abated <WH7043> <WH8804> from off the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>;

But the dove <WH3123> found <WH4672> <WH8804> no rest <WH4494> for the sole <WH3709> of her foot <WH7272>, and she returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto him into the ark <WH8392>, for the waters <WH4325> were on the face <WH6440> of the whole earth <WH776>: then he put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027>, and took her <WH3947> <WH8799>, and pulled her in <WH935> <WH8686> unto him into the ark <WH8392>.
And he stayed <WH2342> <WH8799> yet other <WH312> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; and again <WH3254> <WH8686> he sent forth <WH7971> <WH8763> the dove <WH3123> out of the ark <WH8392>;

And the dove <WH3123> came in <WH935> <WH8799> to him in the evening <WH6256> <WH6153>; and, lo, in her mouth <WH6310> was an olive <WH2132> leaf <WH5929> pluckt off <WH2965>: so Noach <WH5146> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> that the waters <WH4325> were abated <WH7043> <WH8804> from off the earth <WH776>.

And he stayed <WH3176> <WH8735> yet other <WH312> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; and sent forth <WH7971> <WH8762> the dove <WH3123>; which returned <WH7725> <WH8800> not again <WH3254> <WH8804> unto him any more <WH5750>.

And it came to pass in the six <WH8337> hundredth <WH3967> and first year <WH8141>, in the first <WH7223> month, the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, the waters <WH4325> were dried up <WH2717> <WH8804> from off the earth <WH776>: and Noach <WH5146> removed <WH5493> <WH8686> the covering <WH4372> of the ark <WH8392>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127> was dry <WH2717> <WH8804>.
And in the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, on the seven <WH7651> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, was the earth <WH776> dried <WH3001> <WH8804>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Noach <WH5146>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Go forth <WH3318> <WH8798> of the ark <WH8392>, thou, and thy wife <WH802>, and thy sons <WH1121>, and thy sons <WH1121> ' wives <WH802> with thee.

Bring forth <WH3318> <WH8685> with thee every living thing <WH2416> that is with thee, of all flesh <WH1320>, both of fowl <WH5775>, and of cattle <WH929>, and of every creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>; that they may breed abundantly <WH8317> <WH8804> in the earth <WH776>, and be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8804>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8804> upon the earth <WH776>.
And Noach <WH5146> went forth <WH3318> <WH8799>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his wife <WH802>, and his sons <WH1121> ' wives <WH802> with him:

Havahry beast <WH2416>, every creeping thing <WH7431>, and every fowl <WH5775>, and whatsoever <WH3605> creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>, after their kinds <WH4940>, went forth <WH3318> <WH8804> out of the ark <WH8392>.

And Noach <WH5146> builded <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> unto the YY <WH3068>; and took <WH3947> <WH8799> of every clean <WH2889> beast <WH929>, and of every clean <WH2889> fowl <WH5775>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8686> burnt offerings <WH5930> on the altar <WH4196>.

And the YY <WH3068> smelled <WH7306> <WH8686> a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>; and the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> in <WH413> his heart <WH3820>, I will not again <WH3254> <WH8686> curse <WH7043> <WH8763> the ground <WH127> any more for man's <WH120> sake <WH5668>; for the imagination <WH3336> of man's <WH120> heart <WH3820> is evil <WH7451> from his youth <WH5271>; neither will I again <WH3254> <WH8686> smite <WH5221> <WH8687> any more every thing living <WH2416>, as I have done <WH6213> <WH8804>.

While the earth <WH776> remaineth <WH3117>, seedtime <WH2233> and harvest <WH7105>, and cold <WH7120> and heat <WH2527>, and summer <WH7019> and winter <WH2779>, and day <WH3117> and night <WH3915> shall not cease <WH7673> <WH8799>.
